title: "Markerstudy’s Dan Fiehn joins fintech as chief operating officer"
excerpt: "Markerstudy’s group chief operating officer Dan Fiehn has been appointed chief operating officer at fintech Incited. Fiehn has worked at Markerstudy for the past decade. In his new role, however, he will help lead Incited in its next stage of growth."
